testcase.name: verifyGunnisonHome

failure.message:
Found 8 accessibility violations: 1) Elements must have sufficient color contrast: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/color-contrast?application=axeAPI a) [".button-14 > .fusion-button-text"] Fix any of the following: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.48 (foreground color: #cf7038, background color: #ffffff, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
2) Headings must not be empty: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/empty-heading?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-title-15 > .title-heading-center[data-fontsize=\"\\37 0\"][data-lineheight=\"\\39 8px\"]"] Fix any of the following: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
b) [".fusion-title-19 > .title-heading-center[data-fontsize=\"\\37 0\"][data-lineheight=\"\\39 8px\"]"] Fix any of the following: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
3) Heading levels should only increase by one: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/heading-order?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-text-5 > h4[data-lineheight=\"\\33 6px\"]"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
b) [".fusion-text-12 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
c) [".fusion-text-14 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
d) [".fusion-text-16 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
e) [".fusion-text-18 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
4) Images must have alternate text: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/image-alt?application=axeAPI a) [".wp-image-1748"] Fix any of the following: Element does not have an alt attribute aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation" Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none"
b) [".wp-image-1747"] Fix any of the following: Element does not have an alt attribute aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation" Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none"
5) Document must not have more than one contentinfo landmark: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-footer-widget-area"] Fix any of the following: Document has more than one contentinfo landmark
6) Ensures landmarks are unique: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/landmark-unique?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-footer-widget-area"] Fix any of the following: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable
7) Page must contain a level-one heading: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/page-has-heading-one?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading
8) All page content must be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/region?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-title-1"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
b) [".fusion-title-2"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
c) [".button-1"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
d) [".to-top-container"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.name: verifyAboutUs

failure.message:
Found 4 accessibility violations: 1) Heading levels should only increase by one: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/heading-order?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-text-4 > h3"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
b) [".fusion-text-8 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
c) [".fusion-text-9 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
2) Document must not have more than one contentinfo landmark: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-footer-widget-area"] Fix any of the following: Document has more than one contentinfo landmark
3) Ensures landmarks are unique: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/landmark-unique?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-footer-widget-area"] Fix any of the following: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable
4) All page content must be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/region?application=axeAPI a) [".avada-page-titlebar-wrapper"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
b) [".to-top-container"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.name: verifyCapabilities

failure.message:
Found 4 accessibility violations: 1) Heading levels should only increase by one: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/heading-order?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-text-1 > h4[data-fontsize=\"\\32 4\"][data-lineheight=\"\\33 6px\"]"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
b) [".fusion-text-15 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
c) [".fusion-text-16 > h6"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
2) Document must not have more than one contentinfo landmark: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-footer-widget-area"] Fix any of the following: Document has more than one contentinfo landmark
3) Ensures landmarks are unique: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/landmark-unique?application=axeAPI a) [".fusion-footer-widget-area"] Fix any of the following: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable
4) All page content must be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/region?application=axeAPI a) [".avada-page-titlebar-wrapper"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
b) [".to-top-container"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
expected [true] but found [false]
